original_text: The stranger that is within thee shall get up above thee very high; and thou shalt come down very low.
korean_text: 너의 중에 우거하는 이방인은 점점 높아져서 네 위에 뛰어나고 너는 점점 낮아질 것이며

sentences.original_text: The stranger that is within thee
shall get up above thee very high
and thou shalt come down very low
